data_details.label: Working memory

data: RULE 1 IS fired, k is added to working memory
RULE 7 IS fired, W is added to working memory
RULE 10 IS fired, R is added to working memory
RULE 4 IS fired, h is added to working memory
RULE 3 IS fired, c is added to working memory
No more rules can be fired, C is the final decision
